IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PREPARE INDIVIDUALS FOR A LIFETIME OF INTELLECTUAL EXPLORATION AND PERSONAL GROWTH.
IRS990.MissionDesc: LA JOLLA COUNTRY DAY SCHOOL PREPARES INDIVIDUALS FOR A LIFETIME OF INTELLECTUAL EXPLORATION, PERSONAL GROWTH AND SOCIAL RESPONSIBILITY.
IRS990.Desc: LA JOLLA COUNTRY DAY SCHOOL PREPARES INDIVIDUALS FOR A LIFETIME OF INTELLECTUAL EXPLORATION, PERSONAL GROWTH AND SOCIAL RESPONSIBILITY WHILE INSPIRING GREATNESS FOR A BETTER WORLD. THESCHOOL HAS CAPACITY FOR 1,200 STUDENTS FROM NURSERY THROUGH 12TH GRADE.

Form990PartVIISectionAGrp.TitleTxt: ASST. HOS FOR DESIGN AND INNOVATION
ASST. HOS FOR ENROLLMENT MANAGEMENT AND OUTREACH

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A. BOARD DESIGNATED ENDOWMENT FUNDS ARE USED AT THE DISCRETION OF THE BOARD, AND MAY VARY FROM TIME-TO-TIME. INTEREST AND DIVIDENDS EARNED ON DONOR-RESTRICTED ENDOWMENT FUNDS ARE USED FOR THE PURPOSE STIPULATED BY THE DONORS. THE SCHOOL HAS ENACTED A POLICY OF SPENDING PRINCIPAL OR PRINCIPAL APPRECIATION OF THE FUNDS (ABSENT DONOR REQUIREMENTS TO THE CONTRARY).

THE SCHOOL IS A QUALIFIED SCHOOL EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL INCOME AND CALIFORNIA FRANCHISE TAXES UNDER THE PROVISIONS OF SECTIONS 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE AND 23701(D) OF THE CALIFORNIA REVENUE AND TAXATION CODE, RESPECTIVELY. THE SCHOOL HAS EVALUATED ITS CURRENT TAX POSITIONS AND HAS CONCLUDED THAT AS OF JUNE 30, 2018, THE SCHOOL DOES NOT HAVE ANY SIGNIFICANT UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS FOR WHICH A RESERVE WOULD BE NECESSARY.
CHANGE IN VALUE OF BENEFICIAL INTEREST IN PERPETUAL TRUST 478. CHANGE IN VALUE OF INTEREST RATE SWAPS 2,058,410. TUITION ASSISTANCE -4,483,116.
NOTICE OF NONDISCRIMINATORY POLICY WAS ADVERTISED IN THE SAN DIEGO UNION TRIBUNE ON JUNE 6, 2018.

ALL FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE IS TREATED AS A DIRECT CREDIT TO THE STUDENT ACCOUNT PROGRAM EXCEPT FOR OUR BRING YOUR OWN DEVICE PROGRAM. UNDER THIS PROGRAM, WE ASK THE FAMILIES TO PURCHASE THEIR OWN LAPTOPS FOR THE STUDENTS TO USE. THE FAMILIES PROVIDE DETAILED RECEIPT TO THE SCHOOL. THE SCHOOL WILL THEN REIMBURSE THE PARENTS THE SAME PERCENTAGE THEY RECEIVE IN ASSISTANCE FOR THE LAPTOP UP TO $1,000.

RltdOrgOfficerTrstKeyEmplGrp.TitleTxt: ASST. HOS FOR DESIGN AND INNOVATION

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CURRENT HEAD OF SCHOOL'S SPOUSE OCCASIONALLY ACCOMPANIES THE HEAD OF SCHOOL ON BUSINESS TRIPS (WHEN DEEMED APPROPRIATE), THE VALUE OF WHICH IS REPORTED AS TAXABLE COMPENSATION ON THE CURRENT HEAD OF SCHOOL'S FORM W-2, WHEN REQUIRED. AS PART OF THE HEAD OF SCHOOL'S EMPLOYMENT CONTRACT, THE SCHOOL PROVIDES HIM/HER WITH A HOUSING ALLOWANCE WHICH IS REPORTED AS TAXABLE COMPENSATION ON FORM W-2.
OFFICERS AND KEY EMPLOYEES OF THE SCHOOL CAN OPT IN TO A NON-QUALIFIED RETIREMENT PLAN. DURING THE TAX YEAR ENDED JUNE 30, 2018 SELECT EMPLOYEES CONTRIBUTED $36,000 TO NON-QUALIFIED RETIREMENT PLANS.
THE HEAD OF SCHOOL IS AUTHORIZED TO MAKE NON-FIXED BONUSES TO EMPLOYEES AT HIS/HER DISCRETION.

IssuerName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: ABAG FINANCE AUTHORITY FOR NONPROFIT CORPORATIONS

TaxExemptBondsIssuesGrp.PurposeDesc: THE DATE OF ISSUANCE OF THE BONDS REFUNDED WERE 6/29/2006 AND 7/12/2007.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE K, PART IV, ARBITRAGE, LINE 2C:
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: (A) ISSUER NAME: ABAG FINANCE AUTHORITY FOR NONPROFIT CORPORATIONS THE FINAL ARBITRAGE REBATE AND YIELD RESTRICTION COMPLIANCE REPORT WAS COMPLETED ON 1/27/2014.
THIS NUMBER REPRESENTS THE NUMBER OF CONTRIBUTIONS MADE, NOT THE NUMBER OF ITEMS CONTRIBUTED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SCHOOL'S FORM 990 IS PREPARED BY AN OUTSIDE ACCOUNTING FIRM BASED UPON INFORMATION PROVIDED BY THE SCHOOL. A COMPLETE COPY IS REVIEWED BY INTERNAL MANAGEMENT OF THE SCHOOL FOR ACCURACY AND COMPLETENESS. THE AUDIT COMMITTEE, WHICH HAS RESPONSIBILITY FOR OVERSIGHT OF THE AUDIT AND SELECTION OF AN INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANT, THEN REVIEWS THE COMPLETE FORM 990. THE LAST STEP IN THE REVIEW PROCESS, A COMPLETE COPY OF THE FORM 990 IS MADE AVAILABLE FOR VIEWING TO EACH VOTING MEMBER OF THE SCHOOL'S GOVERNING BODY VIA A PASSWORD-PROTECTED WEBSITE BEFORE IT IS FILED WITH THE IRS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION REGULARLY AND CONSISTENTLY MONITORS AND ENFORCES COMPLIANCE WITH THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY BY HAVING AN ANNUAL WRITTEN CONFIRMATION BY ALL AFFECTED INDIVIDUALS WHO ARE INSTRUCTED TO NOTIFY THE SCHOOL OF ANY SUBSEQUENT CHANGES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE PROCESS FOR DETERMINING COMPENSATION OF THE SCHOOL'S HEAD OF SCHOOL AND OTHER KEY EMPLOYEES INVOLVES THE FOLLOWING: (1) IDENTIFICATION OF KEY EMPLOYEES, (2) REVIEW AND APPROVAL BY A SUBCOMMITTEE OF THE GOVERNING BODY AND THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES, (3) USE OF DATA AS TO COMPARABLE COMPENSATION FOR SIMILARLY QUALIFIED PERSONS IN FUNCTIONALLY COMPARABLE POSITIONS AT SIMILARLY SITUATED ORGANIZATIONS, AND (4) CONTEMPORANEOUS DOCUMENTATION AND RECORDKEEPING WITH RESPECT TO DELIBERATIONS AND DECISIONS REGARDING THE COMPENSATION ARRANGEMENT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
CHANGE IN VALUE OF BENEFICIAL INTEREST IN PERPETUAL TRUST 478. CHANGE IN VALUE OF INTEREST RATE SWAPS 2,058,410.
THIS PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.
